title: Year of the Rooster
content:
Hey guys and girls,  
I'm new to Typophile...just looking for some comments and suggestions...thanks!  
John

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130310022032im_/http:/typophile.com/files/year_rooster_post_5136.jpg)
author: JohnMata

comments.content: Nothing special...it's a made up company, I thought the name sounded cool. I was just trying to experiment with typography...I was eating at a Chinese restaurant!

The ST should connect at the top.

Lose the double-wide bowl of the last R and the extra curve at the far right connecting the YEAR and ROOSTER. Decrease the angle of the yellow enough so that you can see a little white inside the A and R at the end -- the 3-dimensional nature is getting lost over there.

Other than that, it's very cool. Very 1970s disco, good choice of colors and good letterforms.
Cool I will give it a shot...thanks!
